attribs.name: bonds
attribs.current: An injury to the unspoiled wilderness of my home is an injury to me.

attribs.name: flaws
attribs.current: I am too enamored of ale, wine, and other intoxicants.

attribs.name: ideals
attribs.current: Change. Life is like the seasons, in constant change, and we must change with it. (Chaotic)

attribs.name: personality_traits
attribs.current:
I watch over my friends as if they were a litter of newborn pups.

I feel far more comfortable around animals than people.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MM6OKFJ3sK2bxDbpPwD_itemcontent
attribs.current: Made of interlocking metal rings, chain mail includes a layer of quilted fabric worn underneath the mail to prevent chafing and to cushion the impact of blows. The suit includes gauntlets.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MM6OKFJ3sK2bxDbpPwE_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Melee Weapon, Damage: 1d8, Damage Type: Slashing, Alternate Damage: 1d10, Alternate Damage Type: Slashing

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MM6OKFKq6YQDLqx9Phl_itemcontent
attribs.current: A shield is made from wood or metal and is carried in one hand. Wielding a shield increases your Armor Class by 2. You can benefit from only one shield at a time.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MM6OKFKq6YQDLqx9Phm_itemcontent
attribs.current:
Ammunition: You can use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a ranged attack only if you have ammunition to fire from the weapon. Each time you attack with the weapon, you expend one piece of ammunition. Drawing the ammunition from a quiver, case, or other container is part of the attack. At the end of the battle, you can recover half your expended ammunition by taking a minute to search the battlefield.

If you use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a melee attack, you treat the weapon as an improvised weapon (see "Improvised Weapons" later in the section). A sling must be loaded to deal any damage when used in this way.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MM6OKFKq6YQDLqx9Phm_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Ranged Weapon, Damage: 1d8, Damage Type: Piercing, Range: 80/320,Critical Range: 20,Critical Range: 20,Critical Range: 20,Critical Range: 20,Critical Range: 20,Critical Range: 20,Critical Range: 20,Critical Range: 20,Critical Range: 20,Critical Range: 20

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MM6OKFKq6YQDLqx9Phn_itemcontent
attribs.current: Ammunition: You can use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a ranged attack only if you have ammunition to fire from the weapon. Each time you attack with the weapon, you expend one piece of ammunition. Drawing the ammunition from a quiver, case, or other container is part of the attack. At the end of the battle, you can recover half your expended ammunition by taking a minute to search the battlefield.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MM6OKFKq6YQDLqx9Pho_itemcontent
attribs.current:
Includes:

• a backpack

• a crowbar

• a hammer

• 10 pitons

• 10 torches

• a tinderbox

• 10 days of rations

• a waterskin

• 50 feet of hempen rope

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MM6OKFKq6YQDLqx9Php_itemcontent
attribs.current: A backpack can hold one cubic foot or 30 pounds of gear. You can also strap items, such as a bedroll or a coil of rope, to the outside of a backpack.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MM6OKFKq6YQDLqx9Phq_itemcontent
attribs.current: Using a crowbar grants advantage to Strength checks where the crowbar's leverage can be applied.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MM6OKFKq6YQDLqx9Pht_itemcontent
attribs.current: A torch burns for 1 hour, providing bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. If you make a melee attack with a burning torch and hit, it deals 1 fire damage.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MM6OKFKq6YQDLqx9Pht_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Adventuring Gear, Damage: 1, Damage Type: Fire, Range: 20/40

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MM6OKFKq6YQDLqx9Phu_itemcontent
attribs.current: This small container holds flint, fire steel, and tinder (usually dry cloth soaked in light oil) used to kindle a fire. Using it to light a torch - or anything else with abundant, exposed fuel - takes an action. Lighting any other fire takes 1 minute.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MM6OKFLXFEWDLDbggNX_itemcontent
attribs.current: Rations consist of dry foods suitable for extended travel, including jerky, dried fruit, hardtack, and nuts.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MM6OKFLXFEWDLDbggNY_itemcontent
attribs.current: A waterskin can hold up to 4 pints of liquid.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MM6OKFLXFEWDLDbggNZ_itemcontent
attribs.current: Rope, whether made of hemp or silk, has 2 hit points and can be burst with a DC 17 Strength check.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-MM6OKFFwlyntjz2Qty6_description
attribs.current: You have a limited well of stamina that you can draw on to protect yourself from harm. On your turn, you can use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + your fighter level. Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-MM6OKFGS-Oabml1NnFU_description
attribs.current: When a creature you can see attacks a target other than you that is within 5 feet of you, you can use your reaction to impose disadvantage on the attack roll. You must be wielding a shield.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-MM6OKFGS-Oabml1NnFV_description
attribs.current: Thanks to your orc blood, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-MM6OKFGS-Oabml1NnFW_description
attribs.current: When you are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, you can drop to 1 hit point instead. You can't use this feature again until you finish a long rest.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-MM6OKFGS-Oabml1NnFX_description
attribs.current: When you score a critical hit with a melee weapon attack, you can roll one of the weapon's damage dice one additional time and add it to the extra damage of the critical hit.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-MM6OKFHRZ4up-PKjG-D_description
attribs.current:
You have an excellent memory for maps and geography, and you can always recall the general layout of terrain, settlements, and other features around you. In addition, you can find food and fresh water for yourself and up to five other people each day, provided that the land offers berries, small game, water, and so forth.

Specialty: Bounty hunter

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-MNTnaCZ29QyB822jQjC_description
attribs.current:
Starting at 2nd level, you can push yourself beyond your normal limits for a moment. On your turn, you can take one additional action on top of your regular action and a possible bonus action.
Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-MNTpWMZwZh1xgdmDbok_description
attribs.current: Beginning when you choose this archetype at 3rd level, your weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.
